title: Eddy Suarez
text: Eddy Suarez is a <a href="Cuba">Cuban</a> <a href="Olympic%20Games">Olympic</a> <a href="boxer">boxer</a>. He represented his country in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201992%20Summer%20Olympics">featherweight</a> division at the <a href="1992%20Summer%20Olympics">1992 Summer Olympics</a>. He won his first bout against <a href="Lee%20Chil-Gun">Lee Chil-Gun</a>, then lost won in his second bout against <a href="Mohamed%20Soltani">Mohamed Soltani</a>, but lost in his third bout against <a href="Faustino%20Reyes">Faustino Reyes</a>.
